RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 1 400 Y Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 7500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHES TRUE BLUE drifted in, best in duel. AJ IS BLUE clean trip, outnodded. GOLDEN DOC floated in, lost three way duel. CARTEL SHAKALAKA bumped, chased dueling trio. JESS A WILD SHANNON crossed behind foe. BLUE OCEAN lacked room early. PER RULING #25274 FROM THE LOUISIANA HORSE RACING COMMISSION SHES TRUE BLUE WAS DQD FOR A POSITIVE TEST

ENTRY.NAME: Jess a Wild Shannon
ENTRY.OWNER: Peterson Brian and Clay Johnnie Mae

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Doc
ENTRY.COMMENT: floated in, lost three way duel

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 2 350 Y Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 5400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST GREEN DIAMOND strided away. BAYOU KUE speedy, bored out. MS PILOTO FLYING lost footing at start. CHLOES WILDONDAMONEY nipped for show. BP CERTIFIED TALES chased between. COPPER SPEED ROCKET evenly. CW QUICK BRIDE never found stride.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 3 250 Y Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 6500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIZZLE ME A SKILLET battled, won the bob. FIVE STAR CHICK stumbled, lost nod. LOCOMOTIVE never far from it. JJ BABY SWEET JESS mild late interest. HONKIN KK broke outward. I AM CAROLINA mid pack duel. IMA CALENTE KID bobbled break. IGOT SUMTING SPECIAL brushed break. AJS PARTY GIRL trouble free trip. ONE SWEET BUTTER bumped at start.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 4 350 Y Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 5000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHLOES PRIZE kicked clear. TM I SEE A PATRIOT clean, no match. FIRST LADYBUG DOC bid, outfinished. SLP PAINT MY WAGON broke out sharply. KNICK OF TIME urged, no response. WAVING CHICK went to knees break.

ENTRY.NAME: Chloes Prize
ENTRY.OWNER: Trahan, Arnold J. and Trahan, Brandon J.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 5 250 Y Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 4300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RM IM THAT CHICK took off at once. JRS HEZ MAJESTIC winner too tough. BUTCH GLORY second flight duel. SPEEDEAUX PRIZE brushed, no gain. DOUBLE JEOPARDY went evenly. DADDY SWEET PRINCESS stumbled start. GRAND VALEDICTORIAN broke inward. WAVE SHINE pinched back at break.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 6 350 Y Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 11000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 126 lbs.; Older, 128 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY GENEVIEVE long duel, got nod. KOOL KUE BABY BLUE fired, nosed out. JULIES LIL ROGUE floated out midway. PHURIOUS weakened. CALIENTES DASHN FIRE lost path partway. GIANNIRUSSO step slow start. MDA FIVE BAR DEMAND spun wheels at start. GAME JEWEL weaved in and out early.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: LOUISIANA DOWNS RACE 7 350 Y Dirt CR: 70. Maiden Purse 6000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 126 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUE BUENO focused, fired, fast. AJ TAYLORSYAWLSBOSS no match for winner. APOLITICAL CHICKIE second flight duel. CONSTELLATION improved effort. SEREPTAH R3 no excuses. KISS ME SALLY void of response. ONE LOVES CARTEL leaped at start. SURVIVING THE STORM leaning out at break. TWO ONE N LEWIS lunged at break.
